history.content:
The Data Science program website now has updated FAQs. They answer questions about proposals for a major and minor, likely prereqs, Data 8, connectors, advanced classes, and more.

http://data.berkeley.edu/education/faqs

There's also a Piazza for posting questions and getting answers about the overall program. To join:

http://piazza.com/berkeley/other/data001

We'll do our best to keep the information flowing!
history.subject: Data Science program FAQs and Piazza
